author: Kim Smith
title: Taxi involved in serious hit and run in northwest Calgary - Calgary | Globalnews.ca
text:
February 15, 2017 12:20 am Taxi involved in serious hit and run in northwest Calgary By Kim Smith Reporter Global News 
WATCH ABOVE: Police said a stolen pickup truck drove through a stop sign and crashed into a cab. What is this? 
Sponsored content is written by Global News' editorial staff without any editorial influence by the sponsor. If you'd like to learn more... X What is this? 
Sponsored content is written by Global News' without any editorial influence by the sponsor. If you'd like to learn more... - Listen 
Calgary police are investigating a serious hit and run in the city’s northwest involving a taxi. 
The crash happened shortly after 9 p.m. Tuesday on Northmount Drive. Police said a stolen pickup truck drove through a stop sign and crashed into a cab. 
Two people inside the taxi were sent to hospital. 
Police said a man and woman jumped out of the truck and ran away. 
Officers continued to search for suspects as of 10 p.m. Tuesday. 
-With files from Janet Lore © 2017 Global News, a division of Corus Entertainment Inc.
